dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev, at the 34th session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan, uh, just made some strong statements about interethnic harmony.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev, at the thirty fourth session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan, uh, just made some strong statements about interethnic harmony.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan will take firm action against any provocations aimed at undermining interethnic harmony and peace, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev said during the 34th session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan (APK).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he said they'll firmly suppress any provocations aimed at undermining peace, no matter where they come from.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he said they'll firmly suppress any provocations aimed at undermining peace, no matter where they come from.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That is why we have stopped and will continue to firmly suppress any provocations and insinuations aimed at undermining interethnic harmony and peace in our country, no matter who they come from.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he specifically called out, like, foreign-funded NGOs and bloggers who he says are staging negativity-driven provocations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he specifically called out, like, foreign-funded NGOs and bloggers who he says are staging negativity-driven provocations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We must admit that some so-called human rights organizations, bloggers, and journalists " while claiming to champion freedom of speech " attempt to portray everything in Kazakhstan through a lens of negativity, essentially staging provocations. He emphasized that it is no secret that many of these individuals are simply fulfilling the terms of foreign funding.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he even mentioned former citizens launching sponsored attacks from abroad, which is pretty pointed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he even mentioned former citizens launching sponsored attacks from abroad, which is pretty pointed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This also applies to former citizens of Kazakhstan who have left the country and are now launching sponsored attacks against our people from abroad, even trying to blackmail our state institutions, Tokayev said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how he framed it—democracy paid for with foreign money, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how he framed it-democracy paid for with foreign money, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Democracy, so to speak, paid for with foreign money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, and he emphasized that Kazakhstan will solve its own problems based on its own laws and national interests, not someone else's playbook.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, and he emphasized that Kazakhstan will solve its own problems based on its own laws and national interests, not someone else's playbook.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But we will solve them not based on someone else's playbook, but according to our own legislation and national interests.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But he did acknowledge that the country has problems, just like any other nation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he did acknowledge that the country has problems, just like any other nation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are not claiming that Kazakhstan has no problems. Of course we do, like any other country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True, but he's really pushing back against outside influence, especially from groups he sees as cynical or indifferent to Kazakhstan's well-being.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but he's really pushing back against outside influence, especially from groups he sees as cynical or indifferent to Kazakhstan's well-being.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recent revelations about the activities of foreign non-governmental organizations, he said, have exposed their cynicism, greed, and indifference to Kazakhstan " as well as the dark side of certain well-known Kazakhstani grant recipients.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And this year marks the 30th anniversary of the APK, which is a big deal for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this year marks the thirtieth anniversary of the A P K, which is a big deal for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year marks the 30th anniversary of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the Assembly brings together all ethnic groups in the country—it's meant to foster unity and mutual respect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the Assembly brings together all ethnic groups in the country-it's meant to foster unity and mutual respect.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan is a consultative and advisory body that unites representatives of all ethnic groups living in the republic. According to him, the assembly's role goes beyond preserving cultural heritage " it fosters an atmosphere of mutual respect, civic responsibility, and unity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Tokayev chairs it himself, so it's clearly a priority for his administration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tokayev chairs it himself, so it's clearly a priority for his administration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan serves as the Chair of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He called the nation united by long-standing traditions and values, which feels like a direct response to those he accuses of sowing division.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He called the nation united by long-standing traditions and values, which feels like a direct response to those he accuses of sowing division.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our nation is united and bound together as a single historical, cultural, and political community by long-standing traditions and values, by our mentality and way of life, Tokayev concluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think this is partly about controlling the story, especially with international critics?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think this is partly about controlling the story, especially with international critics?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. He's drawing a line between constructive criticism and what he sees as malicious attacks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. He's drawing a line between constructive criticism and what he sees as malicious attacks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is important to be able to distinguish between constructive criticism and baseless attacks, between harmless parody and offensive insults.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he mentioned recent revelations about foreign NGOs, hinting at greed and cynicism behind their actions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he mentioned recent revelations about foreign NGOs, hinting at greed and cynicism behind their actions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recent revelations about the activities of foreign non-governmental organizations, he said, have exposed their cynicism, greed, and indifference to Kazakhstan " as well as the dark side of certain well-known Kazakhstani grant recipients.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a strong stance, but he seems confident that citizens and well-meaning partners will back this logic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a strong stance, but he seems confident that citizens and well-meaning partners will back this logic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am confident that our citizens and well-meaning international partners understand this logic well.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely sets the tone for how Kazakhstan wants to engage with both internal and external voices moving forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely sets the tone for how Kazakhstan wants to engage with both internal and external voices moving forward.
